name: canal construction | canal | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9904/documentation

The dataset represents the construction, the maintenance and land use of one canal with life time assumed to be 118 years.

Canal construction is starting with the material for construction. Canal maintenance and land use is starting with the energy consumption.

The dataset ends with the construction and the maintenance and land use of one canal. The dataset includes the material for construction and the transport of these materials. The dataset doesn't includ the disposal of the canal. For the maintenance and land use dataset, it ends with the maintenance and land use of one port. The dataset includes the energy consumption and land occupation and transformation.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data is based on  a case study of one canal in Germany.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The data are derived from the Main-Donau-Canal in Germany. The canal is characterised by a width of 42 m and an average depth of 4m.  The life span of the canal is assumed to be 118 years. The data employed in this study is derived from Maibach et al. (1999). Data for electricity consumption, predominately due the operation of sluices is derived from Enquête (1994) as quoted in Maibach et al. (1999).  The canal bed area is estimated with 42m2/m canal. In addition, 10 meters at each edge is modelled as road traffic area. The life span of the canal is assumed to be 118 years.;References:;Maibach M., Peter D. and Seiler B. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. INFRAS, Zürich;Enquête (1994) Schutz der Erdatmospäre, Verkehr, Band 4, Studienband, Teilband II. Enquête Kommission, Bonn
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data calculated for one canal in Germany is used as an estimate for Europe.
